data.title: The latest death notices across Wales as families remember loved ones
data.meta_description: Our thoughts are with their families and friends
data.text:
These are all the loved ones remembered in funeral notices and family announcements across Wales this week. To see a full list of family announcements visit this section of the WalesOnline website where you can search by name, date, and location. You can also post your own announcements and notices there.

To add your tributes or memories to any of the death notices of the people who have passed please do so at www.funeral-notices.co.uk/Wales. You can get more Welsh news and other story updates by subscribing to our newsletters here.

Below are the most recent death notices published across Wales this week:

Margaret Elaine ABRAHAM

(of Wimmerfield Crescent, Killay)

Peacefully on Tuesday 29th August 2023 at Morriston Hospital, Margaret aged 94 years, beloved wife of Terence, dear mother of Jane, mother-in-law of Mark, nana of Tom and Wil and great nana to Mason and Emmi.

Margaret will be sorely missed by all who knew her.

Funeral Wednesday 20th September, service 12 noon at Llanelli Crematorium.

Family flowers only, donations in lieu if so desired may be made payable and sent directly to; Cancer Research UK, PO Box 1561, Oxford, OX4 9GZ

Further enquires to Eddie Tucker Funeralcare Telephone 01792 280101

John Stephen ANSTEY

Passed away at home with all his family on 3rd September, John, formerly of Old Court Farm, Rogiet.

Loving husband of the late Rosemary, father of Nicola and Paul and grandfather of Alfie and Sonny.

Private cremation followed by a service at St Mary's Church, Magor on Thursday 21st September at 2.30pm, to which all are welcome.

Donations if desired for St David's Hospice Care may be given online at www.toveybros.co.uk/funeral or sent c/o

Tovey Bros, 9/11 Cardiff Road, Newport, NP20 2EH

Mildred BARRETT (nee Williams)

(nee Williams) Formerly of Gellifawr Road, Morriston

Peacefully on 21st August 2023 at Pen-y-Bryn Care Home, Sketty, Mildred. Beloved wife of the late Leslie, mother of Ann and mother-in-law of the late Colin. Mamgu to Claire and step-grandmother to Sharn, Brian and Kelvin.

Funeral Tuesday 19th September when a Service will be held at Mount Calvary Baptist Church, Elgin Street, Manselton at 2:00pm followed by Interment at Morriston Cemetery, 3:15pm.

Family flowers only, but donations in lieu if so desired to Cancer Research (Cymru) c/o

St James Funeral Home, 31 St James Gardens, Uplands, Swansea SA1 6DT. Tel: 01792 643840

Ann and Claire would like to thank the staff of Pen-y-Bryn Care Home for the kindness and care shown to Mildred.

Sarah Mary BROWN

Peacefully passed away on Monday 4th September 2023 at Glangwili Hospital, Carmarthen. Sarah Mary of Bryncoch Farm, Four Roads.

Beloved wife of the late Ron, loving mother of Marlene, respected mother-in-law of Stephen and sister of Jean and Eurof. She will be sadly missed by all family and friends.

Public funeral service at Nazareth Chapel, Pontyates on Monday 18th September 2023 at 2pm.

No flowers. Donations if so desired to 'Renal Dialysis Unit Patients Amenity Funds' c/o

O.G. Harries Ltd, Funeral Directors, Bethel, Station Road, Pontyberem, Llanelli, SA15 5LF. (01269) 870350

Stan CLARKE

(former nurse at St David's Hospital, Carmarthen and Coombe Cheshire Home, Llangynog)

Peacefully at home on Monday, 4th September 2023, surrounded by his family, Stan of Deveraux Drive, Carmarthen.

Lifelong friend and companion of Pat, loving father of David, William, Peter, Andrew, Edward and Alice, devoted father-in-law of Louise, Bernie, Lindsey and Becky, devoted and proud 'Grandad Stan' to all his grandchildren. Stan was a loyal friend and colleague who will be sadly missed by all.

Public Funeral Service at Llanelli Crematorium, on Friday, 22nd September at 2.00pm.

Family flowers only.

His body will leave Login Chapel of Rest to return to his home in Carmarthen at 6.00pm on Thursday evening.

Further enquiries: Glanmor Evans and Son, Funeral Directors, Login Chapel of Rest, Carmarthen 01267 237100

Mark COCKINGS

Passed away peacefully at Morriston Hospital on Thursday 31st August 2023 aged 59 years. Mark, beloved son of Vera and David, loving father to Richard, Jamie and Rebecca, much loved father in law to Laura, Danielle and Wennsday cherished grandfather to Leo and Ollie, loved brother to Michelle and brother in law to Andrew. Mark will be sadly missed and lovingly remembered by all his family and friends.

Funeral service will take place on Wednesday 20th of September 2023 at Swansea Crematorium at 12.30pm

Family flowers only by request however donations in memory of Mark are welcome for The British Heart Foundation c/o

D.G.Attwell Funeral Directors, 95 Eaton Road, Brynhyfryd, Swansea, SA5 9JH Tel: 01792 650205

Paul CONIPANE

Retired Employee of The City and County of Swansea

Sadly passed away at his home on 1st September 2023, Paul of Venables Close, Cockett.

Loving husband to Claire and a loving stepdad to Ellie, Craig and their partners, devoted bampi to Jenson, Libby, Woody, Freddie and Finley, loved brother and brother-in-law to Nancy and Richard, devoted uncle to Clare, Dean and Dawn, father to Justine and grandfather to Jack. Paul will be sorely missed by his extended family and friends.

Funeral will be held on Friday 15th September 2023. Immediate family only at Bethel Private Chapel of Rest, Cockett at 11.15am followed by a public service where Paul will be laid to rest with his mother at Morriston Cemetery (Section TT) at 12.15pm.

No flowers please at Paul's request.

All family and friends are welcome to celebrate Paul's life at St Helen's Rugby Club from 1.00pm.

You slipped out of my arms and back into your mother's arms knowing that she will keep you safe.

Sleep tight Mr C

Further enquiries to Phillip G Davies & Son Independent Family Funeral Directors, Cockett Tel: 01792 581924

Ronald CONSTABLE

(formerly of Port Talbot Steelworks and ex Merchant Navy) Sadly passed away on 29th August at Gorseinon Hospital, Ron of Middle Road, Cwmbwrla. Beloved husband of the late Tess and Barbara, loving father of Ron, Trisha and Kevin, dear father-in-law of Ann, much loved grandfather of all his grandchildren and great grandchildren, also a loved brother, brother-in-law and uncle. Funeral Friday 15th September, service at Swansea Crematorium, 11am. Family flowers only. Enquiries to D.G. Attwell Funeral Directors, 95 Eaton Road, Brynhyfryd, Swansea SA5 9JH. Tel (01792) 650205.

Sandra Elizabeth COPP (nee Davis)

(nee Davis) Peacefully on 1st September 2023 at her home after a good fight courageously borne, Sandra, loving wife of the late Arthur, proud and devoted mother to Darren, most caring sister of Terry and the late Karen, sister in law of Shirley, Stephen and Stephen, dear cousin of Lynda, Pat and Terry, much respected auntie to Craig, Dean, Paul, Jason and Joanna.

Funeral service at Swansea Crematorium Thursday 21st September at 2pm.

No flowers by request. Donations in lieu if so desired to Anglesey Ward, Morriston Hospital c/o

St James Funeral Home,

31 St James Gardens,

Uplands, Swansea SA1 6DT.

Tel: 01792 643840.

David Brian DANIELS

Ex Sutton Bros, Alpha, Severnside & Lance and Lindi

Passed away peacefully at home on 28th August 2023 with his family at his side, Brian, of Morriston, formerly of Ty Gwyn Farm.

Beloved husband of the late Jennifer, devoted father of Andrew and Tracey, dear father-in-law of Andrew, and loving grandfather of Jade and Casey, and great grandfather of Clayan and Baylee. Much loved brother to Marlene and his late brothers and sisters, and a dear brother-in-law and uncle.

Funeral service taking place at Swansea Crematorium at 2:00 on Thursday 14th September.

Floral tributes and enquiries c/o C. Meirion Hopkin & Son. Tel: 01792 844513.

Evan Glyndwr (Henfryn) DAVIES

(Henfryn) Ar ddydd Sadwrn Medi 2il 2023 hunodd Glyndwr, Derwydd, Heol y Dderwen, Pontweli, Llandysul yn 82 mlwydd oed.

Priod cariadus a ffrind gorau Llewela, brawd ac wncwl hoffus.

Gwasanaeth angladdol preifat yn Amlosgfa Parc Gwyn, Arberth. dydd Gwener, Medi 15fed, 2023 am 1 o'r gloch.

Dim blodau, rhoddion os dymunir er cof am Glyndwr tuag at Ymchwil Cancr Cymru trwy law

Cenfil Reeves a'i Fab, Trefnwyr Angladdau, Garreg Wen, Talgarreg, Llandysul, SA44 4XB Ffôn 01545 590254

Anne Margaret DAVIES (Mitchell)

(Mitchell) Tristwch mawr i Nia, Aled a'r teulu yw cyhoeddi marwolaeth ein Mam a Mamgu annwyl ar 30 Awst 2023 yn 90 oed, yn Ysbyty Tywysoges Cymru, Pen-y-bont ar Ogwr.

Yn briod i'r diweddar Tom, bu'n fam, mam-yng-nghyfraith, a mamgu arbennig iawn. Bu'n athrawes anghenion arbennig mewn sawl ysgol yng Nghwm Rhondda, yn organyddes ac yn aelod ffyddlon o gapel Bethlehem Treorci, ac yn aelod gweithgar o'r Inner Wheel yn y Rhondda cyn symud i Borthcawl. Bydd hiraeth ar ei hôl.

Cynhelir yr angladd yn Amlosgfa Glyntaf am 10:30yb ar 29 Medi, cyn gwasanaeth o ddiolch yng Nghapel Bethlehem am 11:45yb ac yna te a brechdanau i ddilyn yng nghlwb golff Penrhys.

Blodau'r teulu'n unig, ond os dymunir, derbynnir rhoddion yn ddiolchgar iawn ar gyfer capel Bethlehem Treorci neu'r RNLI (drwy justgiving.com chwiliwch am RNLI Anne Davies)

* * * * *

It is with great sadness that Nia, Aled and family announce the death of our lovely Mam and Mamgu on 30 August 2023 at 90 years of age at Princess of Wales Hospital Bridgend.

Wife of the late Tom, she was a loving Mam and mother-in-law, and very special Mamgu. She was a special needs teacher in a number of schools in the Rhondda, an organist and devoted member at Bethlehem chapel Treorchy, and an active member of the Rhondda Inner Wheel over the years before moving to Porthcawl. She will be dearly missed.

Funeral to be held at Glyntaf Crematorium at 10:30am on 29 September and a service of thanks at Bethlehem chapel at 11:45am followed by tea and sandwiches at Penrhys golf club.

Family flowers only, but if desired, donations to Bethlehem Chapel Treorci or RNLI (through justgiving.com, search for RNLI Anne Davies)

Ronald Colman (Ron) DAVIES

DAVIES Ronald Colman (Ron) Sadly on 4th September 2023, Ron passed away.

Devoted husband of Eileen, much loved dad of Colman, Leslie and Joy, dear father-in-law of Carol, Sue and Peter, proud bampi of his grandchildren and great-grandchildren, dearest brother of Connie, Olive and the late Billy and Dorothy.

Funeral service at Swansea Crematorium Monday 18th September at 11.00am.

Family flowers only please. Donations in lieu, if so desired, to Ward V, Morriston Hospital c/o

St James Funeral Home,

31 St James Gardens,

Uplands, Swansea SA1 6DT.

Tel: 01792 643840.

David Hefin EVANS

Yn dawel yn Ysbyty Glangwili ddydd Llun 4ydd Medi, hunodd Hefin, Fron Uchaf, Llanboidy yn 52 mlwydd oed.

Tad annwyl Dafydd a Dyfan, mab gofalus Meirwen a'r diweddar Alun a brawd tyner Huw, Haydn a Howard.

Trefniadau pellach i ddilyn.

Ymholiadau i Dennis Jones Trefnwr Angladdau, Efailwen. Ffôn 01994 419561

Gwyneth Mary GARNER

Peacefully on Thursday 31st August 2023. Gwyneth, beloved wife of the late Phil, devoted mam of Graham, Alan, Paul, Philip, David and Kevin and a loving mother-in-law, grandmother and great grandmother. She will be greatly missed by all of her family and friends.

The funeral service will take place on Thursday 14th September 2023 at Ty-Hedd Funeral Home, 2:00 pm, followed by a committal service at Swansea Crematorium, 3:00 pm.

Family flowers only, but donations in lieu of flowers if so desired to Alzheimer's Society either through the South Wales Evening Post or Graham J. Sullivan Funeral Directors website, Funeral Notices.

Enquiries to:

Graham J. Sullivan Funeral Directors, Ty-Hedd Funeral Home, Mynydd Garnllwyd Road, Morriston, Swansea, SA6 7QG Tel 01792 775262.

Allan GOULD

Peacefully on Monday, 28th August at Neath Port Talbot Hospital, Allan of Delffordd, Rhos, Pontardawe.

Beloved husband of the late Carol and sadly missed by all his family and friends.

Funeral on Friday, 22nd September, service at Margam Crematorium at 12.45p.m.

Family flowers only. Donations in lieu, if so desired, to Cancer Research UK will be kindly received by the Funeral Directors

Evan Rees and Hywel Griffiths,

Funeral Directors, 98 Heol Cae Gurwen,

Gwaun Cae Gurwen, Ammanford SA18 1PD

Henry Gwyn GRIFFITHS (Gwyn Heol Ddu)

Gwyn Heol Ddu Passed away peacefully at home on 1st September 2023, Gwyn,

of Heol Ddu Newydd Farm.

Beloved husband of the late Dorothy

Devoted father of Gillian, Kathy, Robert, Iwan and the late Jennifer,

dear father-in-law to Lynden, Dale and Melanie, loving Bampi to his grandsons Joshua, Robbie, Ioan, Gareth, Dylan, Ethan and Jake

Much loved son of the David and Winifred Griffiths

Funeral taking place on Wednesday 13th September;

Service at Saron Chapel Rhydyfro at 12:00,

followed by a private family burial service.

Family flowers only please; donations in lieu welcomed,

supporting Marie Curie, via: https://gwyn-griffiths.muchloved.com,

or by cheque c/o C. Meirion Hopkin & Son, 96 High Street, Clydach, Swansea SA6 5LN. Tel: 01792 844513.

Andrew David HARDING

Tragically on Wednesday 30th August, Andrew, beloved son of Marilyn, loving brother of the late Lee, dear father of Kirsty, and a devoted dad & hero of Liam.

Andrew will be sadly missed but fondly remembered by all who knew and loved him

Funeral service Monday 18th September, 3pm at Swansea Crematorium. Immediate family flowers only, donations in lieu if desired may be send directly to Swansea Mind 66 St. Helens Road, Swansea, SA1 4BE

Further enquiries to Rees Davies & Son Funeralcare 01792 456976

Dorothy HECKLER

HECKLER Dorothy Suddenly on Sunday 20th August 2023, Dorothy passed away at Morriston Hospital.

Dearly loved wife of Godfrey. She will be sadly missed by all her family and friends.

Funeral service Thursday 14th September at Swansea Crematorium, 12:30pm.

No flowers by request, but donations in lieu if so desired towards the Kidney Ward, Morriston Hospital; cheques payable to Cardigan Ward, c/o

St James Funeral Home,

31 St James Gardens,

Uplands, Swansea SA1 6DT.

Tel: 01792 643840.

David Simon HUGHES

We regret to inform you of the passing of our Simon Hughes, and we would like to extend our heartfelt condolences to all those who knew and loved him.

We invite you to join us in paying our final respects via this page or in person on Friday, September 15th, 2023, at 12:30 pm.

For all those looking to celebrate Simon's life privately, we ask that you plant Daffodil bulbs and use the first blooms of the year as a moment to reflect on what he meant to you. We invite you to join us in paying our final respects at Swansea Crematorium on Friday, September 15th, 2023, at 12:30 pm.

The memorial service will be a brief gathering, lasting approximately 30 minutes.

There will be ample space to accommodate everyone who wishes to attend. If you do plan on coming, we kindly request that you inform the family in advance.

Following the service, there will be a wake where we can reminisce and share stories. Further details about the wake will be provided at the service.

Your support and presence during this time are greatly appreciated. We hope to see you on Friday, September 15th.

A tribute page has been created, where you can leave memories and donate supporting Marie Curie in memory of Simon: https://simonhughes.muchloved.com.

David HUTCHINSON

Suddenly, but peacefully on 16th August 2023 at the Princess of Wales Hospital with family by his side, aged 79 years.

David, of Bryn Road Glyncorrwg (and latterly Ty Nant Care Home), was a beloved brother of Vera and Eunice, a much loved family member of many cousins and extended family, and an employee of Remploy (Neath Abbey & Port Talbot) for over 40 years.

David received care, support and love from family, friends, neighbours, the community, Remploy and Ty Nant Care home, which enabled him to live a long and happy life. David had a strong Christian faith and will be fondly remembered by all who knew and loved him.

The funeral will take place on Friday 15th September 2023 at Margam Crematorium at 2.30pm, followed by refreshment at Noddfa, Dunraven Street, Glyncorrwg, SA13 3AD.

Family flowers only please, or donations if desired to Croeserw Community Enterprise Centre c/o Mr Craig Perfect, Gareth A. Jenkins Independent Funeral Directors of Baglan Funeral Home, 115 Pentwyn Baglan Road, Baglan, Port Talbot, SA12 8EB, Tel. 01639 790333.

Gordon JENKINS

JENKINS Gordon (Formerly of Jersey Marine)

Passed away peacefully at home on Sunday 27th August 2023, aged 92 years, with his loving family by his side.

Devoted husband, loving father, cherished brother and adored grampa, Gordon will be dearly missed by all his family and friends.

Funeral service at Margam Crematorium on Monday 18th September at 1:45pm.

Family flowers only, however donations in memory of Gordon gratefully received for Welsh Ambulance Service c/o Les Davies Independent Funeral Directors Neath Funeral Home, Main Road, Cadoxton, Neath, SA10 8AP. Tel 01639 642945.

Shirley Pamela JOHN

Peacefully, on 30th August 2023, Shirley, much loved mother, grandmother and great grandmother.

Funeral Service, 10 am, Friday Sept 15th, Swansea Crematorium. No flowers; donations in lieu to Motor Neurone Disease Association c/o John Edwards Funeral Directors, 5 Cwmbath Road, Morriston, Swansea, SA6 7AH. Tel: 01792 771232.

Hazel JONES

Passed away peacefully on 4th September aged 74 years, Hazel, formerly of Plasuchaf, Llanarthne and Brynteg, Carmarthen. Former head of Biology at Queen Elizabeth Cambria School, Carmarthen.

Hazel will be lovingly remembered by her sister-in-law, nieces, nephews and their families, and her many friends.

Public Funeral Service on Friday, 15th September 2023, at Llanarthne Parish Church at 11.00am, with refreshments to follow at the Village Hall.

Donations in memory, if desired, to: 'Tearfund' received by Glanmor Evans and Son, Funeral Directors, Login Chapel of Rest, Llangunnor Road, Carmarthen SA31 2PG 01267 237100

John Humphrey (John Frongoch) JONES

(John Frongoch) Yn dawel yn Ysbyty Glangwili, yn 88oed, bu farw John, priod annwyl iawn Elsie, tad tyner Catrin ac Elin, tad-yng-nghyfraith y diweddar Andrew, tad-cu balch Sioned ac Alaw, brawd a brawd-yng-nghyfraith.

Colled enbyd.

Angladd breifat yn Amlosgfa Arberth ar ddydd Mawrth, 12fed o Fedi am 2.30yp.

Blodau'r teulu yn unig.

Trefnwr Angladdau Eifion Jones Deganwy, Cwmduad, Carmarthen Tel. 01267 281 489.

Danny JONES

Yn dawel ddydd Sadwrn 2ail o Fedi yn 'Burrows Hall', Llangennith, David Daniel o Fferm Carreg Lwyd, Felindre. Gŵr annwyl Helen, tad cariadus Ieuan, Eryl a Siân. Gwelir ei golled yn fawr gan ei deulu oll. Angladd ddydd Mawrth 19eg o Fedi, gwasanaeth cyhoeddus yng Nghapel Nebo, Felindre, Abertawe, SA5 7NB am 1:00 y prynhawn. Cleddir ei weddillion ym mynwent y capel. Blodau'r teulu'n unig. Cyfraniadau os dymunir naill ai tuag at D.P.J Foundation neu Ward Dan Danino, Ysbyty Treforis, drwy law y Trefnwyr Angladdau

Hywel Griffiths a'i Fab, Trefnwyr Angladdau, Bwtrimawr, 39 Heol -y- Betws, Betws, Rhydaman, SA18 2HE. Ffon: 01269 593637.

Phillip JONES

Passed away on 19th August 2023 at Morriston Hospital. Phillip, of Leslie Street, Aberavon, Port Talbot, devoted husband of the late Cathy, dearly loved father of Christie, dear father-in-law of Kathryn, proud Daddo of Luke and Rhys, much loved brother of Ann, John, Pat, Julie and Sue, loved brother-in-law and uncle.

Funeral service on Friday 15th September at Margam Crematorium at 11.15am.

Family flowers only please, donations may be made to Asthma & Lung UK c/o Luke and Rhys Jones, 21 Mariners Point, Aberavon, Port Talbot, SA12 6DL.

Further enquiries to Mr Craig Perfect, Gareth A. Jenkins Independent Funeral Directors of Baglan Funeral Home, Tel. 01639 790333.

Ronald Charles JONES

JONES Ronald Charles Ex Plumber

Sadly on Thursday 24th August 2023 at Morrison Hospital, Ron, devoted husband of Lynne, much loved dad of Kelly, Claire, Michelle, Helen and Lesley, loving bampi Ron of all his grandchildren and great-grandchildren, a loved brother of Winnie, cherished by his dog Jay Jay.

Ron will be sadly missed by all his family and many friends.

Funeral Friday 15th September when a service will be held at Swansea Crematorium at 11.30am.

Flowers please to

D.G. Attwell Funeral Directors,

95 Eaton Road, Brynhyfryd,

Swansea SA5 9JH.

Tel (01792) 650205.

Margaret JONES

Yn dawel, nos Fercher y 23ain o fis Awst, bu farw Margaret, gweddw Arwyn, mam Alun a Dafydd, a mamgu gariadus Daniel, Padrig, Sera, Wiliam, Anna, Lleucu a Gwen.

Cynhelir y gwasanaeth angladdol o dan ofal y Parchedig Dr Alun Tudur yn Amlosgfa Caerdydd a Morgannwg, yn y Barri, ar y 18fed o fis Medi am 2 o'r gloch.

Rhoddion os dymunir trwy law Catrin Wooler, cofiomargaret@gmail.com tuag at Ymchwil Canser Cymru.

Muriel (previously Grove) LANG (nee Dalling)

(nee Dalling) (previously Grove) Peacefully passed away at home surrounded by her loving family on Friday 18th August 2023, aged 96. Muriel of Ewenny place, Clase, beloved wife of the late Ken and Phillip. Devoted mother of Carol and the late Tony. Adored nan to Claire, Donna, Tina, Danielle, Jason and the late Darren and Sian. Great nan to Lauren, Nia, Elis, Declan, Caden, Bryce, Rory, Leoni, Jax, Oakley, Lewis, Kenzie and Mali. Muriel will be sadly missed by her family and those that knew her.

Resting at Ty Hedd Funeral Home until her funeral on Tuesday 19 September, where a service will be held at Swansea Crematorium at 11:00am.

Flowers welcome.

" Gone from our sight, but never from our hearts"

Enquiries to: Graham J. Sullivan Funeral Directors, Ty-Hedd Funeral Home, Mynydd Garnllwyd Road, Morriston, Swansea, SA6 7QG Tel 01792 775262.

Priscilla LEWIS

Yn dawel yn ei chartref ddydd Mawrth 5ed Medi, hunodd Priscilla o Bryngwenllian, Hendygwyn yn 91 mlwydd oed.

Priod hoff y diweddar Hywel, mam, mamgu a hen famgu gariadus.

Angladd breifat yn Amlosgfa Parc Gwyn, Arberth ddydd Llun 18fed Medi am 12.15 o'r gloch.

Blodau'r teulu'n unig.

Derbynnir rhoddion er côf os dymunir tuag at Meddygfa Tâf Hendygwyn, trwy law

Dennis Jones Trefnwr Angladdau, Maesawelon, Efailwen. SA66 7UX Ffôn 01994 419561

Gareth MILES

MILES Gareth Yn dawel ar 6ed o Fedi, gartref gyda'i deulu, hunodd Gareth, yn 85 mlwydd oed, gynt o Bontypridd.

Gŵr cariadus Gina, tad annwyl Elen, Branwen ac Eiry, taid arbennig Osian ac Esyllt, Gwyn ac Angharad, brawd Lisabeth a Gill, brawd-yng-nghyfraith Rhian a'r diweddar Chris ac Eurig Wyn, a thad-yng-nghyfraith Ceri, Owen a Dai. Cyfaill da i lawer.

Angladd ddydd Gwener, 22ain Medi 2023. Gwasanaeth Cyhoeddus yn Amlosgfa Glyn Taf, Pontypridd am 12:45yp â derbyniad i ddilyn yng Nghlwb y Bont, Pontypridd.

Blodau'r teulu'n unig.

Rhoddion er cof am Gareth, os dymunir, tuag at: 'Cymdeithas yr Iaith Gymraeg', 'Morning Star' neu 'Parkinsons UK' trwy law Glanmor Evans a'i Fab, Trefnwyr Angladdau, Capel Gorffwys Login, Heol Llangynnwr, Caerfyrddin SA31 2PG 01267 237100

Kathleen Ann (nee Davies) MILLS ("Kathy")

("Kathy") (nee Davies) (Formerly of D.S.Smith, Cardboard Factory)

Passed away peacefully on Sunday 27th August at Morriston Hospital. Kathy of London Road, Neath.

Much loved wife of Stephen, loving Step-mother to Richard and David, devoted sister to Liz, Stephen, Stuart, Geoffrey and the late Andrew. A dear sister-in-law and a cherished grandmother.

Funeral service at Margam Crematorium on Wednesday 20th September at 1.45pm.

Family flowers only please. Donations in lieu in Memory of Kath may be made to the British Heart Foundation c/o

Les Davies Independent Funeral Directors, Neath Funeral Home, Main Road, Cadoxton, Neath, SA10 8AP. Tel 01639 642945.

John Derek MILLS

Peacefully on 30th August 2023 at Morriston Hospital. John of Townhill Road. Beloved husband of the late Sylvia. Devoted father of Shirley, John, Paul and Brian. Loving father in law of Gary, Lynne and Suzzane. Cherished Bampie of all his grandchildren and great grandchildren.

Funeral Monday 18th September. Friends kindly meet at Swansea Crematorium at 12.00 noon. Family flowers only please. Donations in lie may be made to the British Heart Foundation and sent to Anthony Inkin & Paul Deans, Family Funeral Directors, Kilby Court, Loughor, Swansea, SA4 6RQ Tel 01792 897710.

Terence Lloyd (Terry) MORGAN (Ex Chairman Dunvant Male Choir | Ex Head of Geography Bishop Gore School)

(Ex Chairman Dunvant Male Choir Ex Head of Geography Bishop Gore School) (Terry) Passed away peacefully on 6th September 2023 at Morriston Hospital. Beloved husband of the late Sheila, Father of Alun and Ian, doting Tadcu to Dylan, Edward and Nicholas, dear Father-in-law to Caroline. Terry will be deeply missed by all who knew and loved him.

Funeral Thursday 21st September 2023 where a service will be held at Llanelli Crematorium at 1:00pm.

Family flowers only please, donations in lieu if so desired to 'Morriston Emergency Department' cheques maybe presented to Lee Davies of Phillip G. Davies & Son Independent Family Funeral Directors Cockett. SA2 0GB. Tel: (01792) 581924.

Royston (Ex Metal Box Maintenance, Royal Engineers, Morriston Town AFC.) MORRIS (Roy)

(Roy) (Ex Metal Box Maintenance, Royal Engineers, Morriston Town AFC.) Peacefully on Monday 21st August 2023, at Hengoed Court Nursing Home.

Roy, dear husband of the late Glenys. He will be sadly missed by all who knew and loved him.

Funeral Service to be held at Ty-Hedd Funeral Home, 2:15 pm, followed by interment at Morriston Cemetery, Section SS, 3:15 pm on Tuesday 12th September.

No flowers by request, but donations if so desired to Royal British Legion either through the South Wales Evening Post Website or The Graham J. Sullivan Funeral Directors website, Funeral Notices.

Enquiries to: Graham J. Sullivan Funeral Directors, Ty-Hedd Funeral Home, Mynydd Garnllwyd Road, Morriston, Swansea, SA6 7QG Tel 01792 775262.

Christopher Idris NICHOLAS (Chris)

(Chris) Quietly on Tuesday, 29th August at Glangwili Hospital, Chris of Llandybie passed away. Much loved husband of Judith, devoted father of Emma and Stephen, dear father-in-law of Arwel and Jessica, adored grandfather of Elin, Lowri, Catrin and Rhiannon.
